projects.title: AI Academy Landing Page
projects.description: I designed the client's vision and implemented the development of the landing page for the AI Academy, using React + Vite and TailwindCSS + Motion for an engaging, responsive, and SEO-optimized experience.

projects.title: Vendie Dashboard
projects.description: I led the comprehensive migration of the main dashboard from a monorepo architecture in React 17 to a modern structure with React 19, using Vite, Shadcn/UI, Zustand, React Query, and Axios, enabling greater scalability and maintainability.

projects.title: Vendie landing page
projects.description: I was responsible for the complete development and modernization of the user interface for the company's products. Initially, I designed and developed a dynamic landing page using React + Vite, TailwindCSS, and Framer Motion, ensuring an engaging, responsive, and SEO-optimized experience.

projects.title: Liguanova Landing Page
projects.description: I developed and designed the landing page for Liguanova, focusing on both user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) design. I built the page using React, leveraging Vite's capabilities for efficient development and optimized project builds, and gave it a stylish touch with Tailwind CSS and Motion for animations.

projects.title: Cybersecurity Academy Landing Page
projects.description: I developed and designed the landing page for the Cybersecurity Academy, adding animations with Motion and emphasizing SEO. The page was built with React + Vite, leveraging Vite’s capabilities for efficient development and optimized project builds, and I gave it a stylish touch with Tailwind CSS.

projects.title: Chrisvd9 Dashboard UI
projects.description: I developed and designed this user interface dashboard for sale, focusing on both user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) design. NOTE THAT I AM STILL DEVELOPING IT, IT IS NOT FINISHED. THIS IS JUST A PREVIEW.

projects.title: DATA-STRATEGY Landing Page
projects.description: I developed this landing page for the company DATA-STRATEGY, which is in its early stages.

projects.title: Xplo01t CL - Chrisvd9 Portfolio
projects.description: I developed and designed my own portfolio, focusing on both user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) design.

projects.title: Lizilib
projects.description: I was responsible for developing and designing the frontend of Lizilib, a platform that simplifies the bidding process and provides AI-powered assistance through a chatbot. Using web scraping in the backend, I visualized the data through informative cards and connected the chatbot. Lizilib includes various features that facilitate the bidding process with the government.

projects.title: GrowCloud Landing Page
projects.description: I developed and designed the landing page for GrowCloud, focusing on both user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) design. I built the page using React, leveraging Vite’s capabilities for efficient development and optimized project builds, and gave it a stylish touch with Tailwind CSS and custom CSS. I used Gsap and Aos for animations.

projects.title: Lizilib Landing Page
projects.description: I developed and designed the landing page for Lizilib by GrowCloud, focusing on both user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) design. I built the page using React, leveraging Vite’s capabilities for efficient development and optimized project builds, and gave it a stylish touch with Tailwind CSS.

projects.title: Educational Landing Page
projects.description: I developed and designed this landing page for educational purposes, focusing on both user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) design. I built the page using React, leveraging Vite’s capabilities for efficient development and optimized project builds, and gave it a stylish touch with DaisyUI, custom CSS, and Framer motion animations.

projects.title: Gmail UI Clone
projects.description: I created a visual clone of the Gmail interface with Next.js and Tailwind CSS. Note that this version does not include interactive features.

projects.title: Short Jokes AI Generator
projects.description: Short joke generator made with NextJS, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and the OpenAI API.
